casebody.data:
In re BROUGHTON. No. 240P15-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Celeste G. Broughton, Raleigh, for Broughton, Celeste G. Kenneth R. Murphy, III, Attorney at Law, for Wake County.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of August 2015 by Taxpayer for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
